scene_description_enriched: A tonsured friar, depicted with a halo, stands against a red, gold-flecked background. He wears a grey habit adorned with gold trim. In his right hand, he holds a golden crucifix with a pinkish figure of Christ. To the right, a crescent moon shape is visible against a gold background, suggesting a celestial or symbolic setting. The friar's gaze is directed upwards and to the right, conveying a sense of devotion or contemplation.
